name: Forensic Housing Service
description: The Forensic Housing Program serves 55 formerly incarcerated women and men living with HIV/AIDS in the County of San Francisco. Residents receive up to 18 months of transitional supportive housing and coordinated case management to stabilize their lives with the long-term goal of achieving safe, clean and affordable permanent housing.
